page.title: 04Sandalwood Close
page.content: I live in Sandalwood Close near my school,Ben Jonson.It is off Harford St. near Poplar Ambulance Station.It is a very quiet place to live.The houses are modernish,maisonettes,houses and flats. The people who live near me are a mix- ture of white and black but there are no Asians.They are reasonably happy and get on well together.There are quite a few children between the ages of 4 and 12 living in my block,James House.Most of us go to the same school.We have a games playing area in our Close where we can play most games like football, tennis,cricket and rounders.At the back of James House there is a swing on a tree that Jason Wright and I made.It is a great place to live because most of my friends live nearby and there are 2 beautiful Yorkshire Terriers which I play with. David Longworth(10)
